name: Security HUB
description: Security Hub is designed for setting up and managing the security and fire alarm system Security Hub by TEKO.  Security Hub is a smart security system for your home or office, which can in time notify you about an unauthorized access into your premises, smoke generation, water leakage, etc., wherever you are. Security Hub works via Internet channels and uses highly protected data transfer protocol. In addition, Security Hub provides information about temperature in your pemise and allows you to remotely control various equipment in your home or office.   Security Hub is a small controller that collects information about status of wireless sensors of various types. The system supports up to 30 wireless sensors.   The Security Hub application allows: - setting controller and wireless sensors - arming/disarming alarm system fully or by separate zones (rooms) - receiving alarm notifications  - remote control of various equipment  - temperature control - delegating system control to your friends or family members
